| A exterminator:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* hits creatures as a +1 weapon. |                                                                                                                  |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                  |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5440](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5440 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **exterminator**, @, is a [Undead slayer](/wiki/Undead_slayer "Undead slayer") [quest guardian](/wiki/Quest_guardian "Quest guardian"). They share the lower speed of their associated role, and have a somewhat higher base level than other quest guardians, but are otherwise unremarkable.
html:
Exterminator

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ exterminator
Difficulty 10
Attacks Weapon 1d8
@ exterminator
Difficulty 10
Attacks

Weapon 1d8

Base level 8
Base experience 118
Speed 10
Base AC 10
Base MR 10
Alignment 10 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) Not randomly generated
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A exterminator:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • hits creatures as a +1 weapon.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line5440

The exterminator, @, is a Undead slayer quest guardian. They share the lower speed of their associated role, and have a somewhat higher base level than other quest guardians, but are otherwise unremarkable.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Exterminator&oldid=131886"
